recipe.title: Mockingbird Cake
recipe.subtitle: (Makes 2 Loaf Tin Things)
recipe.ingredients: 3 C Flour 2 C Sugar 2 tsp Baking Soda 2 tsp Baking Powder 1 tsp Cinnamon 1/2 tsp Salt 4 eggs 1 1/2 C Vegetable Oil 1 tsp Vanilla essence 3 C Banana 1 C Walnuts 1 C Crushed Pineapple (Drained)
recipe.steps: Sift dry ingredients into a bowl. Add beaten eggs, vanilla and oil. Combine well with fruit and nuts. Bake 180C for 1 1/4 Hrs Ice with cream cheese Icing
